# Introduction
\ My name is **Zhuohui(Jeffrey) Liang**, a Chinese travel lover now located in 
New York City. 
<br><br>
\ I'm first year Master of Science student at Columbia University in New York 
City. My interest is in statistical method in data science, specifically the 
mathematics reasoning behind every method in use and how to maximizing result 
from the data with specific method. 
<br><br>
\ Before joining Columbia for further education, I had data analytic and coding 
experience in the fields of ICD-10 classification system building, 
Health accounting, 
eHealth allocation and health disparity in China.
